terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks
Class IntuitiveBlocks

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks.IntuitiveBlocks
public class IntuitiveBlocks
extends java.lang.Object

These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "intuitive" control.

Because these building blocks are rather specific in purpose they are included here as utilities instead of as general purpose building block classes in the framework core.

Method Detail

buildOverEnabler

public static final OverEnableMapper buildOverEnabler(AppView view,
                                                      javax.media.j3d.BranchGroup pickRoot,
                                                      java.util.ArrayList pickList,
                                                      java.util.ArrayList enableList)
Creates a mouse move and drag sensors, an object picker, and an over enabler and connects them together for continuous target picking and enabling, whether during mouse movement or dragging. All enable targets will be initialized as if no target was picked.

Parameters:
view - Source display.
pickRoot - Scene graph pick root.
pickList - List of pick targets.
enableList - List of enable targets corresponding to the targets in the pick list.

buildDrmTranslationMapper

public static final InputDragTarget buildDrmTranslationMapper(AffineGroup target,
                                                              AppView view,
                                                              boolean cumulative)
Creates an intuitive drag mapper and corresponding source drag mapper, configures them for DRM translation in view X-Y, and connects them to the target object.

Parameters:
target - Target object.
view - Source display. If null drag source is used.
cumulative - True if drag actions are cumulative.
Returns:
New building block.

buildDrmSphereMapper

public static final InputDragTarget buildDrmSphereMapper(AxisAngleSphereGroup target,
                                                         AppView view,
                                                         boolean cumulative)
Creates an intuitive drag mapper and corresponding source drag mappers, configures them for DRM spherical rotation, and connects them to the target object.

Parameters:
target - Target actuator.
view - Source display. If null drag source is used.
cumulative - True if drag actions are cumulative.
Returns:
New input drag mapper.

buildWrmTranslationMapper

public static final InputDragTarget buildWrmTranslationMapper(AffineGroup target,
                                                              WrmDragPlugin wrmPlugin,
                                                              boolean relative,
                                                              boolean cumulative)
Creates an intuitive drag mapper and corresponding source drag mapper, configures them for WRM translation, and connects them to the target object.

Parameters:
target - Target object.
wrmPlugin - WRM plugin with pick engine and source object list.
relative - True if source drag actions are relative. Typically, use false for real WRM and true otherwise. If false should initialize target geometry using updateActuation() instead of initActuation().
cumulative - True if drag actions are cumulative. Typically, use true if relative is true.
Returns:
New building block. Should be connected to an absolute input drag source.

buildWrmSphereMapper

public static final InputDragTarget buildWrmSphereMapper(AxisAngleSphereGroup target,
                                                         WrmDragPlugin wrmPlugin,
                                                         boolean relative,
                                                         boolean cumulative)
Creates an intuitive drag mapper and corresponding source drag mapper, configures them for WRM spherical rotation, and connects them to the target object.

Parameters:
target - Target object.
wrmPlugin - WRM plugin with pick engine and source object list.
relative - True if source drag actions are relative. Typically, use false for real WRM and true otherwise. If false should initialize target geometry using updateActuation() instead of initActuation().
cumulative - True if drag actions are cumulative. Typically, use true for rotations in general.
Returns:
New building block. Should be connected to an absolute input drag source.

buildStickyWrmTranslationMapper

public static final InputDragTarget buildStickyWrmTranslationMapper(javax.media.j3d.Node source,
                                                                    AffineGroup target,
                                                                    javax.media.j3d.BranchGroup root,
                                                                    boolean relative,
                                                                    boolean cumulative)
Creates an intuitive drag mapper and corresponding source drag mapper, configures them for sticky pseudo-WRM translation with a target picker, and connects them to the target object.

Parameters:
source - Reference source object defining the picking plane orientation.
target - Target object.
root - Scene graph pick root containing the target.
relative - True if source drag actions are relative. Typically, use false for real WRM and true otherwise. If false should initialize target geometry using updateActuation() instead of initActuation().
cumulative - True if drag actions are cumulative. Typically, use true if relative is true.
Returns:
New building block. Should be connected to an absolute input drag source.
